crazyballrun.game

Class GameConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.GameConstants

  • public class GameConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameConstants class contains all available constants used in the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ANIMATION_TIMESTEP_MSEC
      Number of miliseconds used for an animation to change picture.
      static java.lang.String COLLISION_EXTENSION
      File extension for collision textures (just Bitmaps allowed, because other file formats sometimes get wrong RGB values in Java).
      static java.lang.String COLLISION_FILE_EXTENSION
      File extension for texture-files (have to support transparency!).
      static java.lang.String GAME_CONFIG_FILE_PATH
      Path and filename of the game configuration XML-file.
      static java.lang.String GRAPHICS_RESOURCE_PATH
      Path leading to the graphics (image files).
      static java.lang.String GUI_BREAK_FRAME_ID
      Unique string identifier for the "pause" menu screen.
      static java.lang.String GUI_CONFIGURATION_PATH
      Path leading to the GUI configuration file (XML formate).
      static java.awt.Font GUI_DEFAULT_FONT
      Default font used for GUI elements.
      static java.awt.Color GUI_DEFAULT_FONT_COLOR
      Default font color used for GUI elements.
      static java.lang.String GUI_IN_GAME_ID
      Unique string identifier for the in-game GUI.
      static java.lang.String GUI_NO_FRAME_ID
      Unique string identifier of the menu screen, if no menu should be shown.
      static java.lang.String GUI_RESOURCE_PATH
      Path leading to the GUI graphics (image files).
      static java.lang.String GUI_START_FRAME_ID
      Unique string identifier for the initial game menu screen.
      static java.lang.String IMAGE_FILE_EXTENSION
      File extension for image-files (have to support transparency!).
      static int INNER_COLLISION_POINTS
      Number of collision points of a vehicle between its polygon-points.
      static java.lang.String LEVEL_DEFAULT_LOADSCREEN
      Filename of the default load-screen of levels.
      static java.lang.String LEVEL_DEFAULT_MUSIC
      Filename of the default background music of levels.
      static java.lang.String LEVEL_FILE_EXTENSION
      File extension of the level-files.
      static java.lang.String LEVEL_RESOURCE_PATH
      Path leading to the level-files of the game.
      static java.lang.String LOG_FILE_PATH
      Path to the log-file of the game.
      static java.lang.String MAIN_PATH
      The main path containing the game-configuration file.
      static int MAX_FPS
      Maximum frame-rate for the physics engine.
      static java.lang.String OBJECT_FILE_EXTENSION
      File extension for Object-xml-files.
      static java.lang.String OBJECT_RESOURCE_PATH
      Path leading to the Object-xml-files.
      static java.lang.String SOUND_RESOURCE_PATH
      Absolute path to the sound file directory.
      static java.lang.String TEXTURE_FILE_EXTENSION
      File extension for texture-files (have to support transparency!).
      static java.lang.String TEXTURE_RESOURCE_PATH
      Path leading to the texture graphics (image files).
      static int TEXTURE_SIZE
      Size of a texture in pixels.

      • INNER_COLLISION_POINTS

        public static final int INNER_COLLISION_POINTS
        Number of collision points of a vehicle between its polygon-points. Do NOT change this number if you're not sure what you're doing. This may have a huge influence on collision-accuracy and performance.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
